text.text_translated: The Hunger Games is an annual event, which the Capitol uses to remind the districts that they are being punished for a past rebellion. Every year, one boy and one girl aged 12 to 18 are chosen from each district by lottery to compete in a battle where only one person can survive. The chosen teenagers are called 'tributes', which is the name given to the people who must fight. The whole nation is forced to watch the event on television.
